name: Gunblued Chainmail Hood
description: Our chainmail hoods are among the most economical on the larp market. Made from butted rings this hooded mail coif drapes nicely on your shoulders and gives an authentic look to your medieval costume.

name: Gunblued Chainmail Hood
description: Our chainmail hoods are among the most economical on the larp market. Made from butted rings this hooded mail coif drapes nicely on your shoulders and gives an authentic look to your medieval costume.

name: Ragnar Chainmail, Dark
description: The Ragnar Black Chainmail is a flexible short sleeve mail armour shirt, made from linked 1mm 4 in 1 steel rings. This larp chainmail covers from shoulders thighs that has reinforced rived steel rings in the armpits designed to support additional stress.

name: Alaric Chainmail, Dark
description: The Epic Black Alaric Chainmail is a flexible mail armor shirt made from linked steel rings. The mail covers the body from the shoulder to the thighs, and has long sleeves protecting the arms to the wrists. Each butted ring interlocks with four other rings in a 4-in-1 design,

name: Ragnar Chainmail
description: Ragnar Chainmail is a flexible short sleeve mail armour shirt, made from linked 1mm 4 in 1 steel rings. This larp chainmail covers from shoulders thighs that has reinforced rived steel rings in the armpits designed to support additional stress.

name: Alaric Chainmail Coif
description: Epic Armoury's new Alaric Chainmail Hood is a flexible mail armor coif made from linked steel rings and made for Larpers. This Larp coif covers the head, neck and shoulders. Each butted ring interlocks with four other rings in a 4-in-1 design.

name: Alaric Chainmail
description: Our Alaric chainmail long sleeve shirt is a full length and is made from 4-in-1 butted steel rings made for Larping. The cool feature of this chainmail is the riveted rings in the armpit preventing the rings from separating under the weight of the mailles.

name: Alaric Chainmail Coif, Dark
description: The Epic Dark Alaric Chainmail hood has been chemically treated to help prevent rust. This dark chainmail coif is a 4-in-one butted ring design and was intended for larping. Made from solid 1mm steel it covers the head and the tops of the shoulders.

name: Riveted Chainmail Steel.
description: This 4-in-1 riveted Chainmail long sleeve shirt is a flexible larp mail armour made from mild steel rings. This mail shirt covers the body from the shoulder to the thighs, and has long sleeves protecting the shoulders to the wrists. This chainmail shirt is built to last but has some weight to it.

name: Chain Mantle
description: The chain mantle adds the right looks and protection to your period costume.  The thick leather padded collar can be adjusted to your neck.  The chainmail drapes nicely on your shoulders safeguarding you from blows.  If appearance is what you are after then this piece of costume is the way to go.

name: Chaimail Hood Alluminium Riveted
description: Our chainmail hoods are among the most economical on the larp market. Made from riveted aluminium rings this hooded mail coif drapes nicely on your shoulders and gives an authentic look to your medieval costume.

name: Chainmail Skirt
description: The Chainmail Skirt is a great, highly flexible way to protect any Larp warrior and does not hinder movement. This chain skirt is supported by two adjustable leather straps and has a nice wide leather belt to secure it firmly in place.
